sentences.en: As for other aspects, we will sporadically hand out questionnaires.
sentences.cn: 在其他方面, 我们会偶尔发送调查问卷.

sentences.en: But Kelly says the parasite gains the upper hand when anti - malarial drugs are taken sporadically.
sentences.cn: 但是凯莉说,如果 抗 疟疾药物不是按时服用,疟原虫就会产生抗药性.

sentences.en: Hepatitis A occurs sporadically and in epidemics worldwide, with a tendency for cyclic recurrences.
sentences.cn: 甲型肝炎属偶发疾病，在世界各地流行，有循环复发的趋势。

sentences.en: Liver injury due to occupational exposure through inhalation and skin contact have been sporadically reported.
sentences.cn: 但经由呼吸道、皮肤及消化道的过度摄取常会导致肝伤害.

sentences.en: Military - on - military violence was common during the Vietnam War, but has occurred only sporadically in Iraq.
sentences.cn: 军队对军队的暴力事件在越南战争中很普遍, 但在伊拉克曾经仅是偶尔发生.

sentences.en: She gently dots it on to the face sporadically to mimic the pattern of real freckles.
sentences.cn: 为了画出来的斑点就像真的雀斑一样，她会在脸上轻轻地点出零零星星的斑点。

sentences.en: Soon , however , Google itself was being sporadically blocked.
sentences.cn: 很快, 谷歌自己也被封杀了.

sentences.en: The distant thunder from the coast continued sporadically.
sentences.cn: 远处海岸边不时传来雷声隆隆。

sentences.en: The species found sporadically along Myanmar coastal areas is Melo melo, a gastropod.
sentences.cn: 此物腹足动物种在缅甸沿海区域MELO偶有发现.

sentences.en: There are some trees sporadically around his house.
sentences.cn: 他的房子周围零星地有点树木。

sentences.en: Yanshanian strongly peraluminous intrusive rocks occur sporadically in the Hebei - Shanxi - Liaoning area.
sentences.cn: 燕山期强过铝质侵入岩零星出露于 冀晋 辽地区.

words.tran_cn: 零星的；分散的；不定时发生的
